Line 111: Line 111:
In the 2001, low-budget film ''Play Dead'', a teen named Dale Spitler, on the verge of [[coming out]], discovers that his friend Violet kills his crush Raymond in a traffic accident. Violet wants Dale's help to dispose that body, Dale realizes that this might be his chance to have [[sexual intercourse]] with Raymond.
In the 2001, low-budget film ''Play Dead'', a teen named Dale Spitler, on the verge of [[coming out]], discovers that his friend Violet kills his crush Raymond in a traffic accident. Violet wants Dale's help to dispose that body, Dale realizes that this might be his chance to have [[sexual intercourse]] with Raymond.
  +   +
On [[Avenged Sevenfold]]'s [[Avenged Sevenfold (album)|self-titled album]], the song A Little Piece of Heaven features necrophilia as a theme. In the animated video for the song, a guy proposes to a girl who rejects him. He then [[kill]]s her and preserves her [[corpse]], [[Cannibalism|eating her heart]] and then having [[sex]] with her. The girl comes back to life and kills him. The two make up and then go on a [[killing spree]] before getting married in [[Hell]].
